attributes.action: Christmas stamps should include appropriate religious imagery.
attributes.background: Christmas is a festival that reflects the Christian heritage of the United Kingdom.  It is a season that appeals to people of faith and no faith but for the Royal Mail to issue stamps at Christmas that have no images related to that Christian foundation is offensive.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as the design of Christmas Stamps is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. 

Stamp design is the responsibility of Royal Mail. You can find more information here:

https://www.royalmail.com/personal/stamps-collectibles-gifts/
